answers.answer: My last pregnancy I was induced two weeks early because my baby was growing fast. She was 9 lbs 5 ozs.
How many weeks were u when they told u you would be induced
At about 30 weeks, my doctor just started taking notice on how big the baby was getting.  At about 37 weeks she decided to induce the following week which was two weeks before my due date.

A friend from high school wasnt induced and she had it but.she did.have a.c.section her water broke at 39 weeks her baby was 8 pounds 15 ouncesAnd a friend of my mom wasnt induced.and.she had gestational diabetes she went into labor a day before.her.due date her baby weighed 7 pounds
Hopefully after my appointment today I'll know more on the plan of action
I am being induced on Sunday morning if rooms are available. But I will maintain my right to back out if they try to push for c sectionI will keep all posted.
I talked to my Dr and he said baby girl's weight is ok but if my numbers start to go high again then an induction could happen but he would wait until Im 49 weeks
I was induced on Tuesday, had my baby at 7:35pm yesterday after 3 long hours of pushing!
Did u have the epidural Michelle

question: I found out at 28 weeks i have gestational diabetes.  Has anyone had to get induced because of it. How big was ur baby. When Did u get induced.
title: anyone being induced
